20110107143644.000|20110107143644.000|CC1|LOSS.                           
20110107143644.000|20110107143646.000|CC1|AGAIN, IF YOU KNOW ANYTHING     
20110107143646.000|20110107143648.000|CC1|ABOUT THE SHOOTING, PLEASE      
20110107143648.000|20110107143649.000|CC1|CONTACT THE POLICE.             
20110107143649.000|20110107143649.000|CC1|THAT'S THE LATEST.              
20110107143649.000|20110107143650.000|CC1|REPORTING FROM REDLANDS, GINA

20110107144635.000|20110107144636.000|CC1|>>> ONE OF THE TWO MEGA
